pages.text: $(thing)Undersoil$() may be tilled to form $(thing)Undersoil Farmland$(). Crops work a little differently when you are Beneath. Beneath crops cannot die, but still need block light to grow.$(br2)Crops have a preferred nutrient: Instead of consuming it, this is the nutrient they will add to over time. The crop will happily consume the other four nutrients in order to grow.

The fertilizers are as follows:$(br)$(li)Sulfur: 20% Heat, 10% Sulfic$(li)Gunpowder: 60% Niter, 10% Sulfic, 40% Deflagration$(li)Blaze Powder: 20% Sulfic$(br2)You can also craft $(thing)Agonizing Fertilizer$(), which has all of the nutrients in a neat package.

pages.name: Gleamflower
pages.text: The Gleamflower (Sulfic) can be grown as a crop, and also found in the world as a plant. It is useful as an infinite light source.
Ghost Peppers (Pep) are an edible vegetable that can be grown in the Beneath! You can find their seeds in Bastions.
